meanings.definition: The act of suffocating or being suffocated.
meanings.sent1: The suffocation of the kitten was accidental.
meanings.sent2: The firefighters arrived in time to prevent the suffocation of the trapped family.
meanings.sent3: The clown's exaggerated fake suffocation act made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The suffocation of creativity can be detrimental to artistic growth.
meanings.sent5: The image of the diver's suffocation haunted her dreams.

meanings.definition: The state of being deprived of oxygen, leading to unconsciousness or death.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that suffocation can occur in various ways.
meanings.sent2: The warning signs of suffocation should never be ignored.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved a fake suffocation that amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The suffocation of hope can be more devastating than any physical pain.
meanings.sent5: The movie scene depicting suffocation was so realistic it made her gasp.
